scripts.bundle:ios: NODE_ENV=production react-native bundle --platform ios --entry-file index.js --bundle-output ./build/bundle/index.ios.bundle --assets-dest ./build/bundle --dev false
scripts.bundle:android: NODE_ENV=production react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output ./build/bundle/index.android.bundle --assets-dest ./build/bundle
scripts.bundle:all: npm run bundle:ios && npm run bundle:android
scripts.bundle:ios:dev: NODE_ENV=development react-native bundle --platform ios --entry-file index.js --bundle-output ./build/bundle/index.ios.bundle --assets-dest ./build/bundle --dev false
scripts.bundle:android:dev: NODE_ENV=development react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output ./build/bundle/index.android.bundle --assets-dest ./build/bundle
scripts.bundle:all:dev: npm run bundle:ios:dev && npm run bundle:android:dev
scripts.reset:dev: npm run clean:bundle && npm run clean:android && yarn start --reset-cache
